alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Hyde; Lyman; Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 10:50PM MDT until June 12 at 11:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sully County in central South Dakota... Southwestern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Hughes County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1150 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Grey Goose to 11 miles north of 5 Mile Corner, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Canning around 1200 AM CDT. Blunt around 1205 AM CDT. Cedar Creek Rec Area around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Joe Creek Rec Area, Harrold, West Bend Rec Area, Lower Brule and Holabird. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
